title: Allow configuration of form defaults in core admin
description:
In solr (4.8.1) Admin Interface the Core Admin provides a form to easily add new cores.
I would be very nice if one could set the form defaults somewhere so you do not have to enter the same values (e.g. instanceDir, dataDir (path only) or schema) again and again though they might be the same every time.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: This seem to already exist in the latest Solr. Unless there is something missing still, this case should be safe to close.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: If there is still a problem with new implementation, let's open a new, more-specific JIRA.
